item.title: Report X-2025021111
item.description:
Report X-2025021111

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-26T06:20:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-20
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UNLOAD SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER USED THE DECSION TREE WHICH LED TO THE FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET. RESPONDER BROUGHT BACK LEAKER TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL. PACKAGE WAS PROPERLY DISPOSED OF.

item.title: Report X-2025021017
item.description:
Report X-2025021017

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-26T06:20:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-17
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UNLOAD SUPERVISOR CALLED IN A LEAKER TO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKING PACKAGE. RESPONDER USED THE DECSION TREE WHICH LED TO THE CORROSIVE RESPONSE PAGE. RESPONDER FOLLOWED THE GUIDLINES IN RESPONSE SHEET TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. RESPONDER BROUGHT LEAKER BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.
